summary: This is an email from attorney Sigrid McCawley to an unspecified recipient, forwarding a message regarding a client who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The email seeks assistance in obtaining a trauma therapist and other forms of aid for the client, whose life and livelihood were ruined by Epstein's retaliation after she reported him to authorities.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Attorney at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP representing a client who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. She is forwarding a request for assistance in obtaining trauma therapy and other aid for her client.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as the perpetrator whose attack on the client after she went to authorities was relentless, ruining her livelihood and causing significant trauma.

connections.description: McCawley is representing a victim of Epstein, seeking aid and support for her client due to the harm caused by Epstein's actions.

events.title: Request for Victim Aid
events.description: Attorney Sigrid McCawley forwards a message seeking assistance for her client, a victim of Jeffrey Epstein, to obtain a trauma therapist and apply for other types of aid, including possibly lost wages.

events.title: Epstein's Retaliation Against Victim
events.description: Epstein's attack on the victim after she went to authorities was relentless, ruining her livelihood and causing significant trauma.

keyFacts: Sigrid McCawley, an attorney at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, is representing a client who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.
The victim's life and livelihood were ruined by Epstein's relentless attack after she reported him to authorities.
The attorney is seeking assistance to obtain a trauma therapist and other forms of aid, including possibly lost wages, for the victim.
The email highlights the ongoing trauma and struggle faced by Epstein's victims even after his death.
The correspondence is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege.
